ygData.subject: Re: Verant ruined the revive line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: It makes it a little less convenient, but I agree it is more true to life like Lana mentioned. Bree ... From: Mr. J Daniels  To:
ygData.messageBody:
It makes it a little less convenient, but I agree it is more true to life
like Lana mentioned.

Bree
-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 29, 1999 12:13 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Verant ruined the revive line of spells


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>Its very possible that Verant realized this tactic was being used, which
>brought on the change. Personally I agree with the change.
>
>
>Mr. J Daniels
>
>
>On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Heather M. Daley wrote:
>
>> From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>>
>>
>> I can confirm that my lvl 39 res does the same thing as well as the lvl
49
>> res, all have the same ill effects.
>>
>> I am on Fennin Ro where they have killed Nagafen now at least twice, i
have
>> not participated but been in the zone and this change to the line of res
>> spells completely blows their tactics out of the water. Basically what
they
>> do is, there are certain number of tanks, tank dies cleric res's them
they
>> continue tanking, especially when on of the tanks is a lvl 50 monk.
Looks
>> like they will have to change their tactics a bit now.
>>
>> Bree Wyndsdale
>> 40th cleric of Fennin Ro
>>
